description: Deploy now your bot, ğ”¹ğ•ƒğ”¸â„‚ğ•‚â„ğ”¸â„‚ğ•‚ğ”¼â„ğ•Š-ğ•1 was developed by Dr hinju tech and mudricky tech. Make sure you fill all valuables to avoid bot from sleeping.

AUTO_READ_STATUS.description: Your contact status will be read automatically (type yes to active or no to deactive; don't write in capital letter)

AUTO_DOWNLOAD_STATUS.description: Your contact status will be downloaded automatically and sent to you (type yes to active or no to deactive; don't write in capital letter)

PM_PERMIT.description: Other users can't use your bot in pm (type yes to active or no to deactive; don't write in capital letter)

BOT_NAME.description: put a name for your bot

BOT_MENU_LINKS.description: add one or many links for your bot menu; eg: url1,url2,url3.....

PUBLIC_MODE.description: type yes to put your bot on public mode or no to put it on private mode

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: insert your heroku APP NAME (the name you wrote at the beginning)

SESSION_ID.description: put your session ID, the code you received after pairing code

NUMERO_OWNER.description: Your number, don't put '+' and put your area code (example of Tanzania '255')

WARN_COUNT.description: this is the limit of warn for warning commands

STARTING_BOT_MESSAGE.description: if you don't want starting-bot-message put no else put yes

PRESENCE.description: Mark your presence: 1 to indicate online, 2 typing, 3 recording, blank = real state.

ANTI_DELETE_MESSAGE.description: if you want to enable anti delete message put yes else put no
